è®¡ç®—æœºå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ï¼ŒBIOS ä¼šåŠ è½½å¼•å¯¼æ‰‡åŒºï¼ˆBoot Sectorï¼‰åˆ°å†…å­˜åœ°å€ 0x7c00ã€‚

ç¼–å†™å¼•å¯¼ä»£ç  â€‹

asm
[org 0x7c00]
[bits 16]

start:
    mov si, hello
    call print_string
    jmp $

print_string:
    lodsb
    or al, al
    jz .done
    mov ah, 0x0e
    int 0x10
    jmp print_string
.done:
    ret

hello: db 'Hello, OS World!', 0

times 510-($-$$) db 0
dw 0xaa55

  • [org 0x7c00]: å‘Šè¯‰æ±‡ç¼–å™¨ä»£ç å°†è¢«åŠ è½½åˆ°å†…å­˜åœ°å€ 0x7c00
  • [bits 16]: æŒ‡å®šç”Ÿæˆ 16 ä½å®æ¨¡å¼ä»£ç 
  • 0xaa55: å¼•å¯¼æ‰‡åŒºç­¾åï¼ŒBIOS é€šè¿‡å®ƒè¯†åˆ«å¼•å¯¼è®¾å¤‡

ä»å®æ¨¡å¼åˆ°ä¿æŠ¤æ¨¡å¼ â€‹

å®æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹åªèƒ½è®¿é—® 1MB å†…å­˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ä¿æŠ¤æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

å…¨å±€æè¿°ç¬¦è¡¨ï¼ˆGDTï¼‰ â€‹

asm
gdt_start:
    dq 0x0                  ; null descriptor

gdt_code:
    dw 0xffff               ; limit
    dw 0x0                  ; base (low)
    db 0x0                  ; base (middle)
    db 10011010b            ; access
    db 11001111b            ; granularity
    db 0x0                  ; base (high)

gdt_data:
    dw 0xffff
    dw 0x0
    db 0x0
    db 10010010b
    db 11001111b
    db 0x0

gdt_end:

gdt_descriptor:
    dw gdt_end - gdt_start - 1
    dd gdt_start

åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ä¿æŠ¤æ¨¡å¼ â€‹

asm
cli                         ; å…³é—­ä¸­æ–­
lgdt [gdt_descriptor]       ; åŠ è½½ GDT
mov eax, cr0
or eax, 0x1                 ; è®¾ç½®ä¿æŠ¤æ¨¡å¼ä½
mov cr0, eax
jmp CODE_SEG:init_pm        ; è¿œè·³è½¬åˆ° 32 ä½ä»£ç 

[bits 32]
init_pm:
    mov ax, DATA_SEG
    mov ds, ax
    mov ss, ax
    mov es, ax
    mov fs, ax
    mov gs, ax
    
    mov ebp, 0x90000
    mov esp, ebp
    
    call kernel_main

ç¼–å†™ç®€å•çš„å†…æ ¸ â€‹

c
// kernel.c
void kernel_main() {
    char *video_memory = (char *)0xb8000;
    const char *message = "Hello from Kernel!";
    
    for (int i = 0; message[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        video_memory[i * 2] = message[i];
        video_memory[i * 2 + 1] = 0x0f; // ç™½å­—é»‘åº•
    }
    
    while (1);  // æŒ‚èµ·
}

æ„å»ºä¸è¿è¡Œ â€‹

Makefile â€‹

makefile
boot.bin: boot.asm
	nasm -f bin boot.asm -o boot.bin

kernel.o: kernel.c
	gcc -m32 -c kernel.c -o kernel.o -ffreestanding

kernel.bin: kernel.o
	ld -m elf_i386 -Ttext 0x1000 kernel.o -o kernel.bin --oformat binary

os.bin: boot.bin kernel.bin
	cat boot.bin kernel.bin > os.bin

run: os.bin
	qemu-system-x86_64 -drive format=raw,file=os.bin

clean:
	rm -f *.bin *.o
